quoteText: By agreeing with the present Terms and Conditions you confirm that you will at all times and in any instances hold pCloud harmless of any claims that may arise in relation to your personal decision to use an Encryption Service, in this case, pCloud Crypto.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
